Don't push your luck, Beast Wars AKA Proto.
I'm from B.C. and let me tell you a little something:
It's OUR water from OUR dams that's giving hydro(power) to California and 
the upper half of the U.S..
And Canada has more forest country, plus UNPOTCHABLE wildlife then you ever 
thought of having.
Plus it's 34% of OUR timber that builds YOUR homes.
So you be careful about boasting about Who needs Who and make sure you have 
ALL the facts next time.
But this is spoken as a FRIENDLY warning, people.
I've never hated Americans and never will...but as a Canadian I cannot stand 
by while my country is spoken about with less credit then I know it 
deserves.
It's mean, un-needed and down right fucking cruel. (excuse the swear)
But there's my 2 cents.

P.S: Sorry about taking up e-mail space, troops. :)  I know how much it 
annoys ya all.
